title: Keyboard-Enabled Drag-and-Drop for Collections
overview: Implemented full keyboard accessibility support for reordering collection items using dnd-kit's keyboard API. Added visible focus rings, Space/Enter key activation for grab/drop operations, arrow key navigation, and comprehensive screen reader announcements. The implementation leverages dnd-kit's sortableKeyboardCoordinates for smooth keyboard-based item movement and includes a dedicated aria-live region for real-time screen reader feedback during drag operations.
overview_bullets: Created useDragAnnouncements hook with screen reader announcements for drag start/over/end/cancel events
Enhanced useCollectionReorder hook with KeyboardSensor configuration and accessibility props
Updated SortableCollectionItem with visible focus rings, drag handle indicators, and ARIA attributes
Updated CollectionItem with keyboard focus styles and screen reader instructions
Integrated accessibility config into CollectionPanel's DndContext with live announcement region

accessibility_features.keyboard_navigation: Space/Enter to grab, Arrow keys to move, Space/Enter to drop, Escape to cancel
accessibility_features.focus_indicators: Cyan focus rings with offset on focused items
accessibility_features.screen_reader: ARIA live region announces drag operations in real-time
